Purpose over Profit

Everybody should have access to learn and experience. Pigeon is connecting the disconnected. Our Purpose over profit fund contributes 5% of profits to a fund to support everybody realising their time to share or enhance their skills and knowledge.

Get in touch

Got a question? Fancy a chat? Pop us a message below and a member of the rather lovely Pigeon Community Team will be happy to help
